name: Ball Run
description:
Ball Run is a game in which you will have to handle a red ball, and your only goal is to advance as much as possible without colliding with anything, and consequently, losing.
The mechanism to make progress and advance the most is the following:

-Every time you find a crossroads there will be two possible paths, to continue straight will be the default path.

-You will be in charge of choosing the right path. It is not a simple choice, you will simply have to press to change the predetermined path, so you will only have a few seconds to change the path before the ball reaches the junction.

-Which is the right way? It will be the path that contains a panel of the same color as your ball, since a collision of your ball with a panel of a color other than the ball will make you lose

Although it seems simple, you will see that it is not, in addition the color of the ball changes as the game progresses
